text: The One and Only is a 1978 American sports comedy movie directed by Carl Reiner and starring Henry Winkler, Gene Saks, Kim Darby, William Daniels, Herv√© Villechaize, Ed Begley Jr., Rowdy Roddy Piper. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1978 comedy movies Category:1970s sports movies Category:American sports comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Carl Reiner Category:Paramount Pictures movies
